v0.8.0

utility-bg

  • bg-(color)
  • bg-mild
  • bg-fade

bg-(color)

背景に色をつける。オブジェクト・コンポーネントを可能な限り上書きする。
(color)は標準のカラーテーブルを参照。

bg-gray
bg-first
bg-second
bg-third
bg-fourth
bg-info
bg-important
<div class="bg-gray">bg-gray</div>
<div class="bg-first">bg-first</div>
<div class="bg-second">bg-second</div>
<div class="bg-third">bg-third</div>
<div class="bg-fourth">bg-fourth</div>
<div class="bg-info">bg-info</div>
<div class="bg-important">bg-important</div>

bg-mild

.bg-(color)と併用すると背景色を弱める。

bg-gray
bg-first
bg-second
bg-third
bg-fourth
bg-info
bg-important
<div class="bg-gray bg-mild">bg-gray</div>
<div class="bg-first bg-mild">bg-first</div>
<div class="bg-second bg-mild">bg-second</div>
<div class="bg-third bg-mild">bg-third</div>
<div class="bg-fourth bg-mild">bg-fourth</div>
<div class="bg-info bg-mild">bg-info</div>
<div class="bg-important bg-mild">bg-important</div>

bg-fade

.bg-(color)と併用すると背景色を薄くする。

bg-gray
bg-first
bg-second
bg-third
bg-fourth
bg-info
bg-important
<div class="bg-gray bg-fade">bg-gray</div>
<div class="bg-first bg-fade">bg-first</div>
<div class="bg-second bg-fade">bg-second</div>
<div class="bg-third bg-fade">bg-third</div>
<div class="bg-fourth bg-fade">bg-fourth</div>
<div class="bg-info bg-fade">bg-info</div>
<div class="bg-important bg-fade">bg-important</div>
